Package seng.monsters.model

Class Trainer

java.lang.Object
seng.monsters.model.Trainer
public final class Trainer extends Object
AN entity with a party of monsters

      public void add(Monster mon) throws Trainer.PartyFullException
      Add a new monster into a party if possible
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      Trainer.PartyFullException - Monsters cannot be added if party has already reached 4 monsters

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • moveMonster

      Switch the ordering of two monster
      Parameters:

      to - The index to removed to
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If either the index is out of bound

    • switchMonster

      public void switchMonster(int from, int to) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Switch the ordering of two monster
      Parameters:
      from - One of the index of the monster being swapped
      to - The other index
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If either the index is out of bound
